title: loadAuthSessionState
description: Overview of the loadAuthSessionState method
slug: wallets/reference/alchemy/signer/classes/AuthClient/loadAuthSessionState
---

Loads a signer from a previously saved authentication session state.

## Import

```ts
import { AuthClient } from "@alchemy/auth";
```

## Parameters

### state

`AuthSessionState`

- The saved authentication session state

## Returns

`Promise<Signer | undefined>`
A promise that resolves to a Signer instance if the session is valid, undefined otherwise
